TopicTitle: :D Jadtiger Ausf. B [WIP] [Release in a few hours]

Articles.Content:
<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/E9c8C2K-TtE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Go Kuromorimine! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)  
  
And darn, the new construction method I used for this tank is awesome. It's also the most fun I've had driving a tank, since it can turn tight, climb over obstacles, and outperform my previous tanks in all maneuvers at full flank speed.

Looks good, only criticism is that its too long and also the mantlet:superstructure ratio is too low

Sir YES SIIIrr !

Armed & Ready to fire !

Wait your instruction siiiiirr !

"F.M.J"
